subject: Re: [junit] ant junit performance problem
msgSnippet: ... Hm. Then I m sorry I don t know what to tell you. If you figure it out, please tell us, since we get this question every so often and I ve never seen a
messageBody:
Daniel Rabe wrote:

> Thanks for your response. When I run the tests in the same JVM (from the
> IDE), it does NOT chew up memory. Therefore, I don't think it's a problem
> with my code.

Hm. Then I'm sorry I don't know what to tell you. If you figure it out,
please tell us, since we get this question every so often and I've never
seen a response.
